suite.name: Install.prerequisites
suite.attributes: # install standard system and development tools sudo apt-get install wget unzip python make g++ # install GNU autotools sudo apt-get install cmake # install GNU gcov results generator sudo pip install gcovr

suite.name: Download.framework
suite.description: **Downloads** the Google Test framework from googlecode.com
suite.attributes: wget https://googletest.googlecode.com/files/gtest-1.7.0.zip unzip gtest-1.7.0.zip mv gtest-1.7.0 gtest rm gtest-1.7.0.zip

suite.name: Build.lib
suite.attributes: cd gtest mkdir build cd build cmake -Dgtest_build_samples=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG='-g -fprofile-arcs -ftest-coverage' ../ make clean gtest

suite.name: Run.tests
suite.description: Execute **all** of the sample test cases
